Name: Apple Black Royal
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: Richly flavoured apple and blackberry fruit liqueurs, bolstered and fortified with calvados, charged and given character with rosé champagne.
History: Created in 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Black Royal contains 110 calories
